introduction: Is eating healthily always expensive? For audio and transcript downloads, a quiz and a list of the w

vocabulary.example: Some people are struggling to afford their food shopping.

vocabulary.definition: differences in size, degree, or circumstances
vocabulary.example: Diets are the single largest cause of health inequalities in the UK.
Each WhatsApp group has a mentor who shares cooking tips and advice.

vocabulary.definition: using too much force or being too harsh
vocabulary.example: Ally was heavy-handed with the chilli in her dish, making it very spicy.
The soup tasted disgusting because I was heavy-handed with the salt.

vocabulary.definition: designed to respond to the actions, commands, etc., of a user
vocabulary.example: You can test what you've learned with the interactive quiz on our website.

vocabulary.definition: summarize and review the main points
vocabulary.example: Let's recap the vocabulary we've learnt in this lesson.

vocabulary.definition: a location connected to the internet that maintains one or more web pages
